function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees.","Impact":"Decreased customer satisfaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time store occupancy management systems and reservations to control crowd density.","Technologies":"Real-time store occupancy management systems, smartphone signals, consumer apps.","People":"Shoppers, employees, retailers","Owner":"Retailers"},{"Description":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings.","Impact":"Decreased customer satisfaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Alleviating negative feelings caused by crowding, implementing measures to manage queue flow.","Technologies":"VR experiences, queue management systems.","People":"Shoppers, employees, retailers","Owner":"Retailers"},{"Description":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases and reduced revenue.","Mitigation":"Implementing real-time store occupancy management systems and crowd density estimation technology, providing real-time updates on crowdedness.","Technologies":"Real-time store occupancy management systems, smartphone signals, consumer apps.","People":"Shoppers, employees, retailers","Owner":"Retailers"}]}
